Text: Welcome to today's edition of *game title* .
We come to you LIVE from the V&A Dundee.
Lets find out what incredible treasures our visitors have in store for us today.
Tell me what you have brought in for me Gerald.
Hi Fiona, well today I decided to bring this macaroni pie.
What a gorgeous piece, how did it come to be yours?
Well, its actually been passed down the generations for as long as i can remember.
Incredible! and what are your thoughts about it? do you keep it displayed in the livingroom?
Ive got a wonky table so it does a great job at fixing that
I hope it continues to go on being part of the family, the pie market has really been taking off as of late
I estimate this pie reaching to around £1000 to £1500 in auction, truly one of the best examples ive seen.
might just have it for my tea tbf
